column1: I received a sample in a magazine and tried it...wonderful so ordered from Walmart great price, and the product I fell makes a difference in the appearance of fine lines, I am 67 years old and have tried many...this is now the product for me!

I was so pleased with my first purchase that I bought it again. It appears to be almost too thick but spreads beautifully. My skin feels soft and looks years younger. I like the "glow" I have now! Feels great under makeup as well.

I love this product. But I live in Texas where it's a 100 degrees all the time. This product is thick and just sweats off of your face. So again since I paid for it I decided to use it at night. Wow I'm glad I did. What a difference. And we have so much sun so by the time morning comes it's all in my skin. and I still have sunscreen until I get to my face in the AM. Then I use the Revitalift anti-wrinkle+ and firming day cream.

I bought this product 5 months ago I've been using it ever senseI love it the way it goes on pretty creamy I love the fragrance I have seen results in my lines they been disappearing I think this cream is good for the winter months when is mostly more dry or if you're doing lots of swimming or outdoors activity in the summer and your face gets pretty dry after the sun it will work great

I have oily skin yet at night its dry. Most night and day creams that worked for me were extreamly pricey and those that were cheap did not hydrate but then i found this product. Light weight yet it was creamy and dense. It last all day. I even use it at night. My skin is soft and looks refreshed. Scent is very soft. Works well with my sensitive skin and did not break me out. My boyfriend who has extra dry skin loves it.

Bought this a while back and liked it at first. Nice, smooth texture, not too heavy. Have used 2/3 to 3/4 of it, then the skin under my eye starts drying out. I check the ingredients, and there's the probable culprit: salicylic acid. Why add a known skin-drying agent to a moisturizer? This stuff is not cheap, either! I will not be buying this again.
I have been buying this and it is very effective for me. I have been using this for years.
I am on my late 50s and I don't look like one they say.
I felt the most moisturized skin I have used daily in the last 2 weeks. I think the signs are getting softer.

After giving this cream 3 days days of use the reddness and greasey gloss (didn't absorb ) .I was very disappointed especially buying a full size jar.I think oil of olay products are much more skin active and gives better results .
My skin has never been softer, less prone to breakouts, or looked so even and smooth! I'm 48, and using the whole line, my skin is better in the last 2 months than it was in my 20's!!!

With the cold weather hitting New England, I decided I finally needed to start using moisturizer. I'm 50 and haven't used facial moisturizer before because my skin was always oily. Now, I know I should have been using moisturizer all along. I picked up Age Perfect Cell Renewal Night Cream and Age Perfect Cell Renewal Day Cream at CVS the other day. After one use, my skin was soothed, soft and the roughness is smoother. I can't believe how healthy my skin looks after just a few days.
Light, absorbs quickly, we'll see if it helps my fine lines!!!

My skin looked tighter and I had less puffiness when applied in the morning. I felt like I had a more youthful glow and that gave me more confidence to face the day. Any product that has this claim makes me happy and able to enjoy the day so much more. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After facial surgery, when the assistant removed the tape, she literally tore some skin with it. It left an area about the size of a nickel damaged, and crinkled. After one month of faithfully applying Age Perfect at night, I swear to you it has totally disappeared! My skin, overall, has improved immeasurably

I like the moisturizer it helped me with my dry skin but i do not like that they add perfumes I do not need perfumes in my face So it started irritating my sensitive skin so it is a shame because i do like this face cream. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a great moisturizer for dry skin - it really does hydrate your skin well. But, the day cream (I haven't tried the night cream) has a very strong, sweet scent. The serum has a scent that didn't bother me. This day cream scent stays with you for over an hour. I felt it interfered with the fragrance that I like to wear. It has some nice ingredients - and is truly hydrating but not greasy. I just wish the scent was much milder. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

i really like the product. i wish they sample was a little larger so i could really tell. however, i did like the way it left my skin looking a little plumper and i also liked the it included spf 15. i use about 3 layers of sunscreen so i appreciated the additional protection. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I only tried a sample but I love how it feels on my face and I have very dry skin. Other products do not make my skin feel moist, but this one did and not too greasy. I am going to buy the product and see how it performs in the long run. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I RECEIVED A FREE SAMPLE IN THE MAIL AND BOY AM I GLAD I DID. I USE OTHER L'OREAL PRODUCTS AND HAVE ALWAYS BEEN SATISFIED WITH THEM. THIS ONE IS A STEP ABOVE IN EFFECTIVENESS IN TREATING MY 64 YEAR OLD DRY DULL SKIN. THANKS FOR LETTING ME TRY IT NOW IT'S TIME TO BUY! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Very good cream. Comes on very nicely, and feels good, skin improves within days of using it. Thank you LOREAL. I wish women would stop complaining about scent or perfumes in cosmetics!! Dear L'Oreal - some of Us still like those beautiful scents you put in your products! It enhances the experience of using a good cosmetic! For those who do not like it-well, buy unscented and stop complaining! 5 STARS !

This day cream absorbs nicely and made my skin feel moisturized without being oily. I used the day cream along with the Age Perfect serum and like the way the duo works to together. An added bonus is the pleasant fragrance. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I liked the sample. There was only enough for one day so it is a little hard to rate but from the one day of use I really liked it. I am probably going to buy it to try for a few weeks and see if I still like it. I could not reaaly see results with one day of use but my skin felt soft after use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love how silky it is between your fingers. Also my face stays mosturized all day! I loved using it during winter
This is my second time purchasing the products. It provides the correct nourishment my maturing skin needs.
Both products for night and day are thick, the substance of paste. Very hard to absorb; makes skin oily.

Nice feel, didn't leave my skin feeling greasy. Looking forward to seeing results from long term use. My only complain is a lack of instructions on the sample pack. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It feels so luxurious on your skin. I had no idea L'oreal had a product line that included this wonderful cream. Thank you. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It seems to work well but the scent is strong and one I really don't care for, when it is first applied. The day cream glides on and leaves your skin feeling nourished. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This works great.

I recd a sample and loved this immediately! So went out and bought the eye cream and day cream. Love, love,love, both! I have tried numerous dept store creams, and was using Elisabeth Arden. No more!!! If you ever discontinue this, you better send me a lifetime supply! The best cream! Smell texture and hydration. Great under makeup!

Didn't notice any difference at all. Fragrance reminiscent of pesticides. SPF so low, didn't seem to make much difference saving skin from sun in any way. Gave it two stars for SPF factor. I love this whole line of products. I feel like I am putting silk on my face. I am 50 years oled and my skin is radiant, soft, and young looking. This product does what it says it does. I am a believer and will use it forever. P,ease don't stop making it. Thanks for a great product.

Because of health issues and the medications I take, my skin has become quite dry and fragile. I've been looking for facial moisturizers that will help protect my skin from damage. I received a sample of Age Perfect Cell Renewal Day Cream in the mail, and was pleased with it's light, silky texture. I will definitely buy the product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried this over the weekend along with the Golden Serum and a trial size of the night cream which I purchased locally. All three products have the luxurious texture that I have come to expect from L'Oreal. There was an obvious improvement in my skin's texture with just the one use. It appeared softer, plumper, less lined and firmer. I will definitely add these products to my skin care routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was disappointed, too. L'Oreal feels they need to add perfume to all it's skincare products! That will break down the collagen in skin! I went back to Clinique after trying too many products that have way too much fragrance it them by L'Oreal. Fragrance is not skincare! I will come back as soon as they decide to make some fragrance free products. Even Olay does!!!
Loved the feel of the cream on my skin. Blended well with a lovely scent too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I like everything L'OREAL, so this was no surprise, that cell renewal day cream is everything the ad says about it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just started using these creams. When I wake up in the morning skin feels moist, I do however still have wrinkles and fine lines. I am looking for a product that will remove wrinkles and fine lines. I plan on continuing to use for next month., Hopefully I will see more results after the projected time suggested.

I received a sample in the mail. I liked Age Perfect Cell Renewal Day Cream SPF 15. The product made my skin feel smooth, velvety and well hydrated. It gave my skin a glowing appearance. Having SPF as an ingredient is a plus. I like to keep my skin protected throughout the day. I like the fact that it does not contain parabens. I have tried to purchase only products that do not have this ingredient included. I would definitely recommend this product and purchase it . [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a free sample of Cell Renewal Day Cream moisturizer along with the Serum. I just finished the sample that lasted about a week. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Amazing product! Very smooth an soft.I bought the trial size and have used it about 2 weeks.Takes a few minutes to soak in so I wait about 5 minutes to put on foundation. No need to use a lot because it spreads really easy.

I feel that the product worked really well . I noticed a difference after just a few days. My only complaint was the smell of the product. The fragrance was very strong. My eyes watered for a few seconds each time I put it on due to the scent. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love the L'Or√©al cell renewal day cream! This cream is just right amount of coverage I like to feel on my skin before applying my makeup for the day!, the smell is wonderful as well! I highly recommend L'Or√©al cell renewal Day Cream! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I found the cream to be very greasy and it felt tacky and sticky on my face. I adjusted the amount of cream I used but it still felt too heavy for me. I think this cream would be a great choice for someone with a dry complexion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This day cream has a pleasant smell and did not cause any breakouts. It is a bit on the greasy side, so make sure you give yourself enough time to let it absorb before you apply your make up. Very little product is needed, so it should last you quite awhile. I've used it everyday for 3 weeks and I've barely used 1/4th of the container. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I looked and felt refreshed (even when I didn't get enough rest). I also found that I did not need to ise any concealer for bags under my eyes. Using this cream enabled me to only need my usual everyday powder. This one wasn't oily which I liked. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think Loreal Age Perfect Cell Renewal Day Cream is an ok product. Yes your skin feels better but the smell is not so great, slightly reminds me of a hair salon. I would recommend the product to an older group range only. I believe my skin did look better after using the product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am pleased with this particular L'Or√©al product. I always look for something that not only works well with my skin but has a nice light scent. This line of products is it for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like how smoothly this product goes on. It's not too thick, but makes my skin feel moisturized immediately. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Cue the Hallelujah chorus! I have finally found a facial cream that works. L'Oreal Paris Age Perfect Cell Renewal Facial Day Cream makes my skin feel wonderful. I have dry skin, so I even use this on my hands. I love the way it smells but I love how well it works even more! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just love the L'Oreal Paris Age Perfect Cell Renewal Facial Day cream. It's not heavy, has a nice smell and it leaves my skin feeling great. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who struggles with having age lines and dry skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved this product . Along with age comes fine lines and wrinkles , but this product not only helped plump them up but it mosturized my skin without leaving an oily residue like most products I've used. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I highly recommend this product as it really helped my face feel refreshed, young, moisturized and smooth ALL day long! Even hours later, my face looked and felt great! This moisturizer is very light under my foundation. Non greasy, and not thick. Takes very little to cover my face and leaves my face very soft and smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like wearing this alone, but not under my makeup, it seems too thick. When worn alone, my skin feels nice. This product does not make my skin very oily, which is a concern for me. I will continue to wear the L'Oreal Day cream on weekends. This product works wonders along with the L'Oreal eye cream. It has a nice clean feeling when worn alone. It didn't leave my skin dry which is great,it's so hard for me to find a product that doesn't break out my skin.It left my skin so soft and hydrated. I will definitely be buying some of this.such a wonderful product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
